title: "Apply columns to folder and its children" does not work for "Local Folders"
content:
W10, TB Version 115.0.1 (64-bit).

Follow menus to apply columns to folder and its children and select email address. That works for all the subfolders of my email address just as explained in the help. Try the same for "Local Folders". It asks whether I want to apply the columns I'm looking at to Local Folders and its children. Answer OK. Nothing happens. Other folders in Local Folders still have their old columns and arrangements.
creator: symonjim
